meta.name: Campus Cute
meta.description: 可爱校园风格，粉嫩配色，适合社团招新、校园日常

base.container: background-color: #fff5f8; color: #5c4a4d; font-family: 'PingFang SC', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8; padding: 20px;

header_window.style: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9ecd, #ffc3d0); border-radius: 20px 20px 0 0; padding: 16px 24px; margin-bottom: 24px; border: 3px solid #ffffff; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 157, 0.2);
header_window.title_style: color: #ffffff; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);

headings.h2: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b9d, #ff8fab); color: #ffffff; padding: 12px 22px; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 24px 0 16px; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 157, 0.3);
headings.h3: color: #ff6b9d; font-size: 17px; font-weight: bold; margin: 20px 0 12px; padding-left: 16px; border-left: 5px solid #ffb3d1;
headings.h1: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b9d, #ff8fab); color: #ffffff; padding: 12px 22px; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 24px 0 16px; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255, 107, 157, 0.3);
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #ffe4f0; color: #5c4a4d; padding: 16px; border-radius: 16px; margin: 16px 0; border: 2px dashed #ffb3d1;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #fff9fa; border: 2px solid #ffb3d1; color: #d6336c; padding: 14px 18px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 16px;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fff5f5; border: 2px solid #ff9eb5; color: #c2185b; padding: 14px 18px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 16px;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 3px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #ffb3d1, #ff9eb5, #ffb3d1, transparent); border-radius: 2px; margin: 30px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #ffe4f0; border: 3px dashed #ffb3d1; color: #ff6b9d; padding: 24px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 20px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 40px; padding: 20px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9ecd30, #ffc3d030); border-radius: 20px; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #ffb3d1;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
